title: Should I get a keyboard for my laptop? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are using it to play games, then i recommend you to buy one. Other than that it is not really necessary. And if you are working continuously then, using an external keyboard would help you in following ways More distance from the screen, flexible screen positioning, reduces the pain in wrist,more resale value.

It Depends upon your usage and your type of usage.and its totally upto you ,if you are comfortable with your laptop keyboard go for it if not then you can buy one. However laptops are usually for on-the-go purpose and companies design the laptop keyboards keeping in mind the comfort of each and every person.
